title: Preface Portal
description: Preface Project is a non-profit aiming to boost literacy for underpriviled elementary schoolers by pairing them with high school reading buddies. Preface Portal is a CRM that allows high schoolers to log their meetings with their students, and provides teachers and the non-profit oversight over student progress

title: Stylelex
description: A tool that applies in-house styleguides to text. Built with Flask and React
